name: Acme Corp Deal
notes: Lost to pricing. Customer mentioned our pricing was 30% higher than Salesforce. Also cited better integrations with their existing stack.

name: TechStart Enterprise
notes: Won! Customer loved our AI features and real-time collaboration. Closed after successful POC.

name: Global Industries
notes: Lost to feature gaps. They needed advanced workflow automation that we don't support yet. Also mentioned Monday's better mobile app.

name: InnovateCo
notes: Great fit! Small team loved our simplicity. Beat Notion on collaboration features.

name: MegaCorp Enterprise
notes: Lost in final stages. Security requirements were too complex. Also timeline didn't match their fiscal year.

name: StartupXYZ
notes: Quick win! No competitor. Found us through Product Hunt and loved the onboarding.

name: BigRetail Inc
notes: Lost to enterprise requirements. Needed on-premise deployment which we don't offer. SAP's enterprise focus won.

name: CloudFirst
notes: Currently evaluating. They like our AI but concerned about migration from Pipedrive.

name: FinTech Solutions
notes: In final stages. Security team reviewing our SOC 2 compliance. Competing head-to-head with Salesforce.

name: HealthTech Pro
notes: Won on customer support features! They switched from Zendesk for our better automation.
